acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused persons are absent without any step. Issue NBWA against the accused persons.

Both the accused persons remained absent.NBWA isued against the accused Hankiumong Yimchunger is returned unexecuted with a report that the address mention in the warrant is incomplete and couldn&#039t be executed.Issue fresh NBWA as per report.Also NBWA issued against the accused Alex Sangthan is not returned.Issue reminder to the OC concern.Also notice issued to bailor Shaki Yimchunger is retured after service.Issue bailable warrant of Rs.5000/- against him.Another notice isued to bailorKamsing tokbiis returned unserved with a prayer to fixed another date and same is acceptd.
Both the accused persons namely Alex Sangthan and Hankinmong Yimchunger remained absent.Issue NBWA against the accused person.Also issue notice to the bailors.

Accused persons remained absent.NBWA issued against the accused Hankimong Yein Chongu is returned unexecuted with a report that the address of the accused is not complete and therfore couldn&#039t be executed.Issue fresh NBWA against the accused after clearly checked his record.Also NBWA issued against Alex Sangthan is not yet returned.Issue reminder to the OC concern.
NBWA issued against accused Hankimong Yeimchunger and Alex Sangtam not returned. Issue fresh NBW/A against them. Also issue notice to bailor. Also issue reminder to te concern P/S.

P.O is on E.L     NBW/A and P/A issued against accused Hankimong Yeimchunger and Alex Sangtam not returned. Issue fresh NBW/A and P/A against them.       Notice to bailor Kamsing Tokbi returned unexecuted with report. Issue fresh as per report.
NBWA and PA issued to accused not returned. Issue fresh.Also notice to bailor not returned. Issue fresh
NBWA and P/A not returned. Issue fresh NBWA and P/A against them.Notice to bailor not returned yet. Re-issue the same.

NBWA and P/A not yet returned. Issue fresh NBWA and P/A against the accused persons. Notice to bailor not returned. Issue fresh

Case record received on transfer from Hon&#039ble Sessions Judge, Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.P.O. is on leave.NBWA and P/A issued against accused not returned. Issue fresh NBWA and P/A against him.Notice issued to bailor not returned. Reissue the same.
